name: File Transfer Protocol
description:
A short rhythm/puzzle game.

Made for Mini jam 125.

You are a file being sent across the internet. But, the transfer protocol is filled with bugs! (and some music too???) You have to kill all the bugs to get sent properly!

On green notes, you will move.

On yellow notes, you will shoot.

On red notes, the bugs will move.

Kill all the bugs to win!

Credits:

Code, art: CCeriseGD

Sounds: https://99sounds.org/drum-samples/

Libraries: bump.lua https://github.com/kikito/bump.lua
